FuncDef: This command is used to customize LSP generation throttling. Timers that determine when to generate the first, second, and subsequent LSPs can be controlled with this command. Subsequent LSPs are generated at increasing intervals of the secondlsp-waittimer until a maximum value is reached.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum interval, in milliseconds, between two consecutive occurrences of an LSP being generated. Values-10 to 120000. ParamDefault: Default-  5000

Specifies the initial LSP generation delay, in milliseconds. Values less than 100 ms are internally rounded down to 0, so that there is no added initial LSP generation delay. Values-10 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Specifies the hold time, in milliseconds, between the first and second LSP generation. Values-10 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 1000
